languages.text: "Как того требуют традиции, я решительно заявляю о принятии вашей дружбы".

traits.locale_text: "Как того требуют традиции, я решительно заявляю о принятии вашей дружбы".

languages.text: "As tradition requires, I hereby resolutely declare my acceptance of your friendship."
languages.original_text: "Как того требуют традиции, я решительно заявляю о принятии вашей дружбы".

traits.locale_text: "As tradition requires, I hereby resolutely declare my acceptance of your friendship."
"As tradition requires, I hereby resolutely declare my acceptance of your friendship."
"As tradition requires, I hereby resolutely declare my acceptance of your friendship."
"As tradition requires, I hereby resolutely declare my acceptance of your friendship."

languages.text: «Tal y como estipula la tradición, por la presente declaro que acepto su amistad formalmente y sin ambages».
languages.original_text: "As tradition requires, I hereby resolutely declare my acceptance of your friendship."

traits.locale_text: «Tal y como estipula la tradición, por la presente declaro que acepto su amistad formalmente y sin ambages».

languages.text: 「伝統にのっとり、お前の友情を受け入れることをここに宣言しよう」
languages.original_text: "As tradition requires, I hereby resolutely declare my acceptance of your friendship."

traits.locale_text: 「伝統にのっとり、お前の友情を受け入れることをここに宣言しよう」

languages.text: “按照传统，我在此郑重宣布接受你的友谊。”
languages.original_text: "As tradition requires, I hereby resolutely declare my acceptance of your friendship."

traits.locale_text: “按照传统，我在此郑重宣布接受你的友谊。”

languages.text: « Ainsi que l'exige la tradition, je vous déclare formellement que j'accepte votre amitié. »
languages.original_text: "As tradition requires, I hereby resolutely declare my acceptance of your friendship."

traits.locale_text: « Ainsi que l'exige la tradition, je vous déclare formellement que j'accepte votre amitié. »

languages.text: "Wie die Tradition es verlangt, erkläre ich hiermit resolut meine Annahme Eurer Freundschaft."
languages.original_text: "As tradition requires, I hereby resolutely declare my acceptance of your friendship."

traits.locale_text: "Wie die Tradition es verlangt, erkläre ich hiermit resolut meine Annahme Eurer Freundschaft."

languages.text: "Bu vesileyle, geleneğin gerektirdiği üzere arkadaşlığını kabul ettiğimi kararlılıkla ilan ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "As tradition requires, I hereby resolutely declare my acceptance of your friendship."

traits.locale_text: "Bu vesileyle, geleneğin gerektirdiği üzere, arkadaşlığını kabul ettiğimi kararlılıkla ilan ediyorum."
